fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class DataSet

Object
  AbstractMap
      TreeMap
          DataSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Map, Serializable, SortedMap
public class DataSet
extends TreeMap

A DICOM data set.

This class is used when working with data elements whose value representation is SQ (sequence), or when retrieving all attributes of a directory record in a FileSet or of a DicomMetadata.

A DataSet is a Map which keys are Integer (tags) and which values are DataElement.

See Also:
Serialized Form
